body: OK, after reading the English version and came back here, I realised that my Japanese still needs some brush up. I understood almost the whole story and misunderstood the last 3 pages.
@Softouch Man, Thank you for you synopsis

Story synopsis: Mc's parent asked him and his step sister to work for them in their company since they were graduating soon. Mc rejected the offer but his step sister accepted because she has never rejected her parents before. Mc is angry because they're going to be separated, due to him being in love with her and can't do anything about it. He confronted her and asked why she never rejected her parents and raped her saying that since she never reject them, then she shouldn't reject him fucking her. After he raped her, the time reset back to the same day. He started raping her everyday and every time time resets. He kept repeating the same arguments with her and after 862 resets and 593 rapes, she slowly gains consciousness about the reset and rape. The last rape, she accepted his arguments and found herself accepting him. Hence she allowed him to creampie her. And she confesses that she had been having feelings for him since young. So this time she's going to change for him.
Yo what's going on i don't know what he say
This needs a transition to understand WHAT THE FUK IS GOING ON
